org.epics.archiverappliance.config.ChannelArchiver

Class EngineConfigParser

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.xml.sax.helpers.DefaultHandler
      • org.epics.archiverappliance.config.ChannelArchiver.EngineConfigParser
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ContentHandler, DTDHandler, EntityResolver, ErrorHandler

    public class EngineConfigParser
extends DefaultHandler
    Ability to import a ChannelArchiver engine config file. Support for PVNames, periods and scan/monitor so far.
    Author:
    mshankar
